transcripts.text: Know you are loved.  Rest in peace.  Dream your sweet dreams Till your soul is relieved.  Know you are loved.  Best in peace.  Dream your sweet dreams Till your soul is released.  Bella bella child My heart is yours Beloved child.  Go out and open doors with your love.  With your faith.  With your completion.  With your grace.  Always your grace Beloved child You are the light of the world.  Beloved child Go out, spread light to the world.  Be strong, be kind, be brave.  Know your mind, know that you're divine.  Know that it's alright to be afraid.  Know that you are loved.  Rest in peace.  Dream your sweet dreams till your soul is released.  Know you and love best at ease.  Dream your sweet dreams till your soul is released.  Thank you.
